infos.value: It looks you weren't ready to lead Saiga just yet.
What fortuitous timing. We were just about to execute this man.
But before that...there is one thing I must ask you.
About Gouga and Saiga...the two villages plan to unite into a single nation.
Is this the truth or a fallacy?
Depending on your answer, you may share this man's fate.
You would rather strike us down than answer, I see.
In that case, do not expect any mercy from us.
First, we're going to kill this manâ€”the chief of Saiga. And then...
We'll have some fun with you, Lady Loreila.
You shall not lay a single finger on him.
Interesting... I heard the people of Gouga would kill their own parents for the right price.
